articles.title: Greetings to Gambian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Gambian President
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh, president of Gambia, on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the Gambian president greater success in his responsible work for the stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Premier Inspects Major Industrial Complexes
articles.content:
Premier Inspects Major Industrial Complexes
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field survey of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					 He learned about the production at the complexes before holding consultative meetings.
					
					 The meetings underscored the need for the complexes to bring about innovations in producing Juche fertilizer, vinalon and custom-built equipment by putting production on a normal footing.
					
					 Taken there were measures for increasing production through meticulous management of equipment and technical control and ensuring the satisfactory supply of raw and other materials to the complexes by relevant units.
					
					 The premier also went round the Kumya Youth Coal Mine and convened a consultative meeting in which he stressed the importance of the coal mine's duty and called for vigorously promoting the building of an economic power through increased coal production.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee, Central Military Commission Issue Joint Calls
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee, Central Military Commission Issue Joint Calls
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Joint calls were published by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Wednesday in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the WPK. 
					 The joint calls said that the Seventh Congress of the WPK which would be held in the period when epoch-making changes are taking place in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of the building of a thriving socialist nation would serve as a historic landmark of epochal significance in further strengthening the WPK into the great party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and bringing earlier the final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 They pointed out that it is the steadfast determination and will of the WPK to achieve signal successes to greet the Seventh Congress of the WPK through guerrilla-style attack method created by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and make hurrah for the WPK and socialism resound far and wide across the country. 
					
					 Noting that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are the eternal leaders of our party and people and the sun of Juche and the images of the dignified great Paektusan nation, the joint calls went on:
					
					 Let us spruce up more wonderfully the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun as befitting the holy land of the eternal sun and devotedly defend it! 
					
					 Let us eternally glorify the sacred revolutionary careers and immortal feats of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Let us take it as the lifeline and the key point to implement the behests of the great leaders!
					
					 The calls underscored the need to develop the WPK into the eternally glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Let us make the whole party a crystal of idea and faith imbued with the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism!
					
					 Let us thoroughly apply the people-first principle to the overall party work!
					
					 Let us spare nothing for training the young people!
					
					 Consider it as the revolutionary ethics and revolutionary party discipline to work and live in a simple, honest and upright manner!
					
					 Become the sparks setting fire to the hearts of the masses and detonators giving full play to their mental power!
					
					 The calls underlined the need to make hurrah for the WPK and socialism resound far more loudly this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held by staging an all-out death-defying struggle for building a thriving nation and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 Let's dynamically wage this year's general advance in the same spirit as shown in succeeding in the H-bomb test!
					
					 Let's build an economic giant as early as possible with the strength and the spirit of Korea and at the Korean speed!
					
					 Send more satellites of Juche Korea into space!
					
					 Powerfully demonstrate the revolutionary spirit of the Korean working class in the on-going general advance!
					
					 Finish the building of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 and the Wonsan Army-People Power Station at a time fixed by the Party without fail!
					
					 The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, the Songjin Steel Complex and the Kangson Steel Complex, add fuel to the flames of increased production!
					
					 Produce more new-generation electric locomotives and passenger cars!
					
					 Put the manufacture of Korean-style world-class underground trains on a serial basis!
					
					 Step up the modernization of the mining industry and keep the production of nonferrous metal and non-metallic minerals going at a high rate!
					
					 Provide more resources for building an economic giant by channeling effort into prospecting underground resources!
					
					 Make the foreign trade multilateral and diverse!
					
					 Let's greet the 7th Party Congress with proud achievements in the improvement of the people's living standard!
					
					 Let's add shine to the new history of golden fields created by the great General generation after generation!
					
					 Achieve a great victory on the front of agriculture this year!
					
					 Make the whole country seethe with a high-pitched campaign for producing green-house vegetables!
					
					 Build modern mushroom production bases like the Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm across the country!
					
					 Step up the construction of the stock-breeding base in Sepho area and bring about a new turn in developing poultry and livestock farming!
					
					 Let the modern stock-breeding bases built under the care of the Party pay off!
					
					 Let's massively plant Aeguk Grass!
					
					 Decisively improve the fishing industry of the country by making a revolution in it!
					
					 Let oneself be propellers and nets and thus make the "spectacular scenery of a good catch of fish" in the Songun era be unceasingly presented!
					
					 Let's put the country on the status of an advanced one in sea fish farming by advancing into seas!
					
					 Let's turn the country into the one of orchards!
					
					 Let's give a decisive solution to the problem of consumer goods!
					
					 Let's produce more world-competitive famous products and goods!
					
					 Build more edifices representing the era of the WPK and the spirit of the Korean nation! 
					
					 Make Wonsan area an icon of city layout and build it into a world-level tourist city!
					
					 Establish Korean-style economic management method guided by the Juche idea in a comprehensive manner!
					
					 Let the entire party and army and all the people turn out in the forest restoration campaign!
					
					 Let us make a new history of mountains of gold, enshrining Kim Jong Il's patriotism!
					
					 Let us make our country a land of golden tapestry free from pollution in the era of the Workers' Party!
					
					 Let us maintain the principle of giving priority to self-development in building a thriving socialist nation!
					
					 Put an end to proclivity to import!
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the WPK to build a highly civilized socialist nation at an early date, the calls noted, and continued:
					
					 Let the people enjoy the highest quality of civilization on the highest level!
					
					 Let us make the flames of educational revolution rage furiously in the new century!
					
					 Let us realize as early as possible the processes of turning all people into scientific and technical talents and converting the country into a scientific and technical power!
					
					 Let us give fullest play to the advantages of socialist healthcare system!
					
					 Let us usher in the new heyday in building a sporting powerhouse in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu!
					
					 Let us make the enthusiasm for sports sweep across the country!
					
					 Create new legendary stories about sports of heroic Korea in international games!
					
					 Bring about a revolution in media and literature and arts in the new century!
					
					 Create more masterpieces of the times to make all the service personnel and people burn their hearts with the enthusiasm for the revolution and for struggle!
					
					 Learn from the revolutionary and militant creative style of the Moranbong Band!
					
					 Make the songs of revolution and struggle resound loudly in every worksite through brisk mass-based culture and art activities! 
					
					 Let us make national sentiment and noble and beautiful lifestyle prevail throughout the society!
					
					 Dynamically push forward the building of knowledge-based economic power and a highly civilized nation by dint of science and technology!
					
					 Energetically push forward the work to closely combine science and technology with production and achieve their integration!
					
					 Make world science and technology our own with faith in one's own and national self-esteem!
					
					 Stressing that the revolutionary armed forces guarantee the great victory in the present general offensive toward the Seventh Congress of the WPK, the calls went on:
					
					 Model the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism!
					
					 Let us fight devotedly for respected Supreme Commander Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					
					  Let us defend the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea by strengthening the political and military might of the People's Army in every way!
					
					 Prepare to be elite soldiers of modern warfare and stout fighters who are equipped with the military strategies and tactics of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the heroic fighting spirit and flawless abilities to fight an actual war!
					
					 Give the final doom to the aggressors with arms of Paektusan, if they dare to invade!
					
					 Let us take charge of both national defence and socialist construction!
					
					 Demonstrate to the full the heroic stamina of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army in a drive to create the Korean speed!
					
					 The Korean People's Internal Security Forces should sharpen the sword for defending their leader, system and people!
					
					 Let us become iron shields and red warriors who defend the Party, system and people to the death!
					
					 Build more edifices for the great era of Kim Jong Un faster and more splendidly through army-people cooperation!
					
					 Let us thoroughly implement our Party's policy of putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress!
					
					 Enhance the fighting capacity of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards by intensifying their drills as the anti-Japanese guerillas did in Mt. Paektu!
					
					 Develop and produce a greater number of various means of military strike of our own style that are capable of overwhelming the enemy!
					
					 Let the defence industry sector make a positive contribution to building an economic giant and improving the people's standard of living!
					
					 The whole country will become astir when young people are in high spirits, and a prosperous future will be brought earlier when their steps are faster, the joint calls noted, and went on:
					
					 Become young vanguard unfailingly faithful to respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					
					 Always advance straight ahead, following the Party!
					
					 Let us rush forward along the course of the Korean revolution sailing in the spirit of blizzards of Paektu!
					
					 Glorify every moment of youthful days in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Paektu!
					
					 Provide a present of loyalty to the 7th Party Congress through the creation of new legendary tales about heroic youth!
					
					 The joint calls said that the function and role of the people's government should be remarkably enhanced to further propel the present advance for a great upsurge.
					
					 They called upon the officials to be true persons working devotedly to implement the Party's policies to the last even though they may die!
					
					  Saying that the national reunification is what Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il had desired in their lifetime as well as the long-cherished desire of the Korean nation, the joint calls stressed the need to firmly defend and add brilliance to their undying leadership feats for national reunification and achieve the country's reunification independently in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 They also called for carrying through the independent foreign policy of the WPK to lead the realization of the cause of global independence, adding:
					
					 Let us further expand the external relations in the idea of independence, peace and friendship!
					
					 Let us strengthen solidarity with the progressive political parties and peoples of the world!
					
					 Let us resolutely foil the aggression and intervention moves of the imperialists and dominationists!
					
					 Let us put an end to the anti-DPRK hostile policy of the U.S., the source of confrontation and escalation of tension!
					
					 Let us fight resolutely for the realization of global peace, security and independence!
					
					 The joint calls underlined that all the Party members, servicepersons and other people should make all-out charge in the struggle for the building of a thriving nation in the same spirit as they displayed the dignity and prestige of Juche Korea and thus clearly show the world how Songun Korea will work miracles and display fireworks of victory in May.

articles.title: Foreign Figure Skaters Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Figure Skaters Leave
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Players of Russia, Latvia, Belarus and Canada left here for home on Thursday after taking part in the 24th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Muhammadu Buhari, president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, on Feb. 5.
					 In the message the president said he was pleased to extend the warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the Nigerian government and people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16, 2016), birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the fact that the two countries are boosting cooperation with common views in the international arena while steadily developing the bilateral relations.
					
					 He expressed his firm belief that the reunification of the Korean Peninsula is sure to be achieved independently and peacefully by the concerted efforts of all the Korean people.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico (WPM), on Feb. 4.
					 On the occasion of February 16, the 74th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, the message extended the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il, on behalf of all the members of the WPM and on his own behalf.
					
					 It said that the immortal exploits he performed by frustrating all aggression and provocation moves of the imperialists to stifle socialist Korea and firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the Korean nation with his Songun politics will always be remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Korean people would win only victory in the drive to build a thriving socialist nation and protect peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the region under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un who is faithfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun started by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un greater success in his noble work of leading the WPK and the Korean people to victory.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda, on Feb. 8.
					 The president extended the warmest congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the president, government and people of Uganda on the occasion of the 74th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The president said that Kim Jong Il brought about great changes in socio-economic development through his devoted service for the Korean people and thus turned the DPRK into more united and powerful country.
					
					 Highly praising his career and great exploits, the president said he would join Kim Jong Un in steadily developing the good bilateral relations with the government and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and the Korean people prosperity.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Iranian embassy here gave a reception Thursday at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club to observe the 37th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic Revolution in Iran.
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister of the DPRK Ri Su Yong, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys, military attaches of foreign embassies and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, recalled in his speech that the Iranian people achieved a victory in the revolution for regaining their national independence and sovereignty in 1979 through their costly self-sacrifice and hardships.
					
					 Iran will forge friendly relations with all countries including its neighboring countries and strengthen cooperation to ensure regional and world peace and stability, he said, adding:
					
					 The friendly relations between the DPRK and the Islamic Republic of Iran are growing stronger than ever before. We will work hard to develop the bilateral relations in all fields this year, too.
					
					 Ri Su Yong in his speech said the Iranian people have made strenuous effort to achieve development and prosperity of the nation, foiling all challenges and pressure by the hostile forces for the past 37 years since the victorious revolution.
					
					 The Korean people are pleased with the successes made by the Iranian government and people in defending their right to use nuclear energy for peaceful purposes, developing the country's economy and achieving national prosperity, Ri added.
					
					 He expressed belief that the solidarity and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the struggle for defending the sovereignty and dignity of their countries against high-handed and arbitrary practices of the hostile forces.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Friendship Association Visits Sci-Tech Complex
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Friendship Association Visits Sci-Tech Complex
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Friendship Association led by Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the association headquartered in Spain, visited the Sci-Tech Complex.
					 The guests paid tribute to the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the complex.
					
					 They went round various places such as the basic science and technology hall, applied sci-tech hall and e-reading room, seeing the working people and school youth and children engrossed in studying.
					
					 Meanwhile, the delegation toured the venue of the 20th Kimjongilia Festival, People's Open-air Ice Rink, Mirae Scientists Street, etc.

articles.title: Performances of Chongbong Band Close
articles.content:
Performances of Chongbong Band Close
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Performances by the Chongbong Band of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) came to a close at the Ponghwa Art Theatre Thursday.
					 The performance began with the national anthem and prelude "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il." The performers extended highest tribute and eternal glory to Kim Jong Il who made contributions to the times, revolution, country and its people.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers reflecting the determination of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to hold in high esteem the sun of Songun and their revolutionary enthusiasm to bring earlier the rosy future of powerful Korea at the new speed of Chollima and Mallima under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Among the audience were creators and artistes in the field of literature and arts, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.

articles.title: Foreigners and Overseas Koreans Praise Kimjongilia
articles.content:
Foreigners and Overseas Koreans Praise Kimjongilia
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans were struck with admiration for Kimjongilia after touring its 20th festival.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, said:
					
					 Looking round the venue of the festival presenting fantastic scenery with fully bloomed flowers, I could feel the profound reverence of the Korean people for leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There is no such a grand flower festival praising a great man as Kimjongilia festival in the world.
					
					 Kimjongilia, the flower named after the peerlessly great man, will always be in full bloom as flower of the sun.
					
					 An Son Ok, a Korean in Japan, said Kimjongilia reflects the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man who performed great exploits before the times and history.
					
					 Every fully bloomed Kimjongilia displayed on the stand of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) reflects the boundless reverence of the officials of Chongryon and all other Koreans in Japan who laud the great saint of the nation as the eternal sun, An noted.
					
					 Choe Ryong Ho, head of a Chinese regional delegation of the society for supporting the dissemination of immortal flowers, expressed his excited feelings after touring the festival venue as follows:
					
					 The Kimjongilia festival is getting more peculiar and splendid year by year as desired by Koreans and other world progressives.
					
					 The spectacular scenery presented by Kimjongilias represents the boundless reverence of all people for Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Drama "Admiral Ri Sun Sin" Staged
articles.content:
Drama "Admiral Ri Sun Sin" Staged
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Drama "Admiral Ri Sun Sin" has been recently put on the stage at the National Theatre in the DPRK.
					 The drama with the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598) as its setting deals with the feats performed by Admiral Ri Sun Sin in destroying the Japanese invaders by rousing people to action.
					
					 The drama shows Ri's allegiance to the country and confirms the truth that nothing can arrest the raging struggle of people who turn out in defense of their homeland.
					
					 It grips the audience with perfect role of actors and actresses, costumes, settings and scenes.

articles.title: Little Girl of Literary Aptitude
articles.content:
Little Girl of Literary Aptitude
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Ri So Yon, a schoolgirl at a junior class of Namsan Senior Secondary School in Sunan District, Pyongyang City, is well known among young readers for creating over 100 poems.
					 Some of her poems were awarded the Our Classroom Literary Prize and the April 15 Mangyongdae creation prize of loyalty.
					
					 On the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (October 10, 2015), she presented the collection of her poems "We Celebrate the Holiday of October" to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All her poems are characterized by peculiar style, rich vocabulary and terse composition.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Authors Many Works on Party's Ideological Work
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Authors Many Works on Party's Ideological Work
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities to equip all the service personnel and people of the DPRK with socialist idea in the whole period of his leadership over the revolution.
					 In his work published on September 19, Juche 51 (1962) he clarified that the idea of President Kim Il Sung is the most scientific and revolutionary idea and the organizational will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people and the unity and cohesion of the party could be genuine and unbreakable when it is achieved on the basis of the revolutionary idea of the President. 
					
					 In the talk with officials in Mupho, Samjiyon County of Ryanggang Province on September 4, 1971, he formulated and proclaimed the President's revolutionary idea, Juche idea as Kimilsungism before the world and expressed his firm will to hold high the banner of Kimilsungism. 
					
					 In several works Kim Jong Il clarified the issue arising in carrying out the strategic policy of the party to model the whole party and society on Kimilsungism, the issues of doing away with the method of taking administration upon oneself and administrative way in the party work and doing well the work with people, the essence of the party work, and other issues. 
					
					 He provided important guidelines to be held fast to in the party building and activities including the issues of cementing the politico-ideological base and class base of the party and the revolution, bolstering the national defence capability in every way under the Songun leadership of the party, intensifying the party's guidance to the building of a socialist economic power and increasing the roles of the party organizations and the party officials.

articles.title: Chongryon Headquarters Reject Japanese Government's Independent Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Chongryon Headquarters Reject Japanese Government's Independent Sanctions against DPRK
 Tokyo, February 17 (KNS-KCNA) -- The standing committees of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Feb. 15 to denounce the Japanese government for revealing its provocative hostile intent on the DPRK through unreasonable independent sanctions.
					 The Standing Committee of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, on behalf of all the officials of Chongryon and compatriots, strongly protested against the Japanese government's decision to slap independent sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 The Standing Committee of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon resolutely rejected the Japanese government's independent sanctions against the DPRK which demonstrated before the world the tremendous national power and space science and technology.
					
					 The Standing Committee of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon termed the Japanese government's independent sanctions a part of the policy for isolating and stifling the DPRK which has been pursued in a planned way in order to tighten military nexus among the U.S., Japan and south Korea and an act of gravely violating the right of the Chongryon organizations and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The standing committees of the Aichi, Hokkaido and Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon also condemned the Japanese government's independent sanctions against the DPRK.

articles.title: Koreans in China Hail DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Koreans in China Hail DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Feb. 11 hailing the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The successful satellite launch on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) is a gift of loyalty presented by the space scientists and technicians of the DPRK to the Workers' Party of Korea and the people in the motherland of Juche, the statement said.
					
					 Through the successful launch of Juche satellite the DPRK clearly showed the world that no one can encroach upon its independent right to use space for peaceful purposes, it noted.
					
					 The successful satellite launch this significant year when the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held is giving conviction of victory and optimism not only to the people in the homeland but overseas Koreans, it said.

articles.title: Magazine of International United Confederation of Koreans Issued
articles.content:
Magazine of International United Confederation of Koreans Issued
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans issued the January issue of its monthly socio-political magazine Thongil.
					 It carried the full text of the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un for Juche 105 (2016).
					
					 Edited in it were photos of the Marshal paying a congratulatory visit to the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on the New Year and reviewing the guard honor of the Ground, Naval and Air and Anti-Air Forces of the Korean People's Army. It dealt with revolutionary activities conducted by him in January.
					
					 It conveyed the news that the DPRK government made public a statement on successfully conducting its first H-bomb test and there took place a ceremony for awarding party and state commendations to the nuclear scientists, technicians, soldier-builders, workers and officials who contributed to the successful H-bomb test and an army-people joint rally in Pyongyang.
					
					 It also echoed voices of public at home and abroad that the DPRK's first H-bomb test is a self-defensive step to cope with the U.S. aggression and an exercise of the legitimate independent right.

articles.title: Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on Feb. 13 in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Upon the authorization of the king and the great queen, a delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace, laid the floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Myanmar, Bulgaria and Switzerland between February 4 and 9 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos showing exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 There are also their works, and photos and books introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to open up the heyday of building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Korean films on exploits of Kim Jong II and Kim Jong Un were shown at the film shows. 
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Bulgaria and Switzerland.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place at the DPRK missions abroad from Feb. 3 to 12 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. They included receptions, book and photo exhibitions and film shows at the DPRK missions in Vietnam, Cambodia, Romania, Brazil and Hong Kong, China.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also their works, and books introducing Songun Korea and photos showing the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the final victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Korean films dealing with the exploits and wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un were shown.
					
					 Present there on invitation were figures and diplomatic envoys from the governments, parties, organizations and organs of the relevant countries.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Organizations of Russia, Barbados
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Organizations of Russia, Barbados
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Russia and Barbados issued statements on Feb. 10 hailing the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said:
					
					 The successful satellite launch is a great and grand event in history of Korea.
					
					 This successful launch which exalted the position and dignity of the DPRK is fully supported by the world progressives.
					
					 It is also a great victory won by the Korean people under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We hope that socialist Korea will shed more brilliant rays as a world space power by dynamically kindling the torch to conquer space.
					
					 No force on earth can block the advance of a power strong in idea and faith and with powerful scientific and technological potentials and the advance of the great people rallied close around the party and the leader.
					
					 The Caribbean Movement for Peace and Integration of Barbados fully supported the successful satellite launch of the DPRK, reiterating solidarity with the DPRK government and people in their struggle to defend peace and security in the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Italian, Ugandan Organizations Hail DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Italian, Ugandan Organizations Hail DPRK's Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Public organizations of Italy and Uganda made public statements on Feb. 7 and 8 hailing the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Study Group in Fermo of Italy said:
					
					 We are pleased to hear the news that Kwangmyongsong-4 was successfully put into its orbit under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We send congratulations to the scientists and technicians of the DPRK National Aerospace Development Administration (NADA) upon their shining success made in the satellite launch true to the autographic order of Kim Jong Un and the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching importance to science and technology.
					
					 The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement called on all the UN member states to support the DPRK's space development program for peaceful purposes, adding that the successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 developed by the NADA scientists and technicians eloquently proved that the DPRK made a step forward in the development of science and technology.
					
					 The Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said the successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 according to the 2016 plan of the 5-year program for national aerospace development was a historic event that testified to the great potentialities and self-development in the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Praised by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Praised by Brazilian Figure
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Jose Gil de Almeida, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, issued a statement on February 10 hailing the DPRK's successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 He said that the earth observation satellite newly studied and developed by scientists and technicians of the National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK was successfully put into its orbit.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The West which slandered the DPRK over its first H-bomb test in January is now terming its satellite launch a "missile launch."
					
					 This is part of the anti-DPRK campaign of the West conniving at the U.S. criminal act of extremely escalating the tension in the Korean Peninsula after putting south Korea under its military control long ago.
					
					 Does the UNSC have the right to find fault with the DPRK developing advanced technology to protect the country and its people from the U.S. imperialists' threat?
					
					 No sooner had the DPRK launched a satellite for peaceful purposes than the U.S., Japan and the south Korean authorities requested the UNSC to call an emergency meeting, terming it a "violation of the UN resolution".
					
					 All of them are, however, accomplices in wars and terrorism in various parts of the world.
					
					 Therefore, they are not qualified to take issue with the DPRK over its satellite launch.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Seminars and film shows took place from February 1 to 4 in Kyrgyzstan, Benin, Nigeria and Austria to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star.)
					 Korean films on exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un were shown at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan said thanks to the iron will, matchless pluck and far-sighted wisdom of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK  demonstrated its might as a nuclear weapons state, satellite manufacturer and launcher despite the imperialist allied forces' unimaginable moves to stifle it.
					
					 The chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism who is rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Il built the Workers' Party of Korea into a genuine mother party that serves the people. He always found himself among them and shaped even a single line and policy reflecting their will and wishes.
					
					  The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics said Kim Jong Il made sure that every effort was focused on bolstering military muscle and, on its basis, remarkably increased the overall national power and laid an eternal foundation for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The chief of the Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Austria and other speakers expressed their resolution to intensify the dissemination of the Juche idea and the Songun idea, praising Kim Jong Il's ideological and theoretical achievements and exploits he performed by leading the building of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente gambiano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente gambiano
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Gambia, Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh, con motivo del 51o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais africano.
					El remitente expresa conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Gambia con larga historia se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro.
					
					Y desea al destinatario mayores exitos en su trabajo responsable para la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita empresas importantes en Hamhung
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita empresas importantes en Hamhung
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, recorrio los Complejos de Fertilizantes de Hungnam, de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					  En el terreno el premier se entero del estado de la produccion y convoco las reuniones de consulta.
					
					  En las ocasiones se destacaron la necesidad de normalizar la produccion y producir innovaciones en la produccion del abono del Juche, vinalon y equipos pedidos.
					
					  Ademas, se tomaron las medidas para aumentar la produccion mediante la administracion adecuada de los equipos y la tecnica y suministrar a las empresas suficientes materias primas y materiales.
					
					  Por otra parte, tras recorrer la Mina Carbonifera Juventud de Kumya, Pak convoco una reunion consultiva, ocasion en la cual puso enfasis en la importancia de la mision de la mina carbonifera y exhorto a impulsar activamente la construccion de la potencia economica con exitos de aumento de produccion del carbon.

articles.title: Publicadas consignas conjuntas de CC y CMC de PTC
articles.content:
Publicadas consignas conjuntas de CC y CMC de PTC
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea publicaron el dia 17 las consignas conjuntas con motivo del VII Congreso del PTC.
					El VII Congreso del PTC a convocarse en el periodo en que se registran los cambios seculares en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, marcara un hito historico en fortalecer mas el PTC como gran partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y adelantar la victoria final bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, senalan.
					
					El PTC tiene la firme decision y voluntad de alcanzar con los metodos de ataque al estilo guerrillero, creados por los grandes Lideres antecesores, los relevantes exitos que glorificaran el VII Congreso del PTC, y hacer que repercutan las vivas del Partido del Trabajo y las del socialismo por todas las partes del pais, apuntan 
					
					Los grandes camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il son eternos lideres de nuestro partido y pueblo, Sol del Juche e imagenes de la prestigiosa potencia Paektusan, subrayan las consignas y continuan::
					
					!Acondicionemos mas excelentemente el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan como eterno lugar sagrado del Sol y lo defendamos a riesgo de la vida!
					
					!Glorifiquemos generacion tras generacion las sagradas vidas revolucionarias y las imperecederas proezas de los grandes camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il!
					
					!Mantengamos como linea principal y de vida la materializacion de los legados de los grandes Lideres antecesores!
					
					Las consignas llaman a fortalecer el PTC como eterno partido glorioso de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il:
					
					!Fortalezcamos todo el partido como ente firme en la ideologia y conviccion e identificado con el gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo!
					
					!Materialicemos cabalmente la idea de dar prioridad a las masas populares en las labores partidistas en conjunto!
					
					!No escatimemos los esfuerzos para criar a los jovenes!
					
					!Consideren vivir y trabajar honestamente como etica y temperamento partidista revolucionarios!
					
					!Sean tizones y detonadores en conmover el corazon de las masas y explorar su fuerza espiritual!
					
					Las consignas insisten en la necesidad de desplegar una ofensiva general para la construccion de un Estado prospero y la mejora de la vida del pueblo para que repercutan mas las vivas del Partido del Trabajo y las de socialismo en este ano del VII Congreso del PTC:
					
					!Aceleremos con dinamismo la marcha general de este ano con el impetu de haber realizado con exito la prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno!
					
					!Levantemos cuanto antes la potencia economica con la fuerza, el impetu y la velocidad de Corea!
					
					!Lancen mucho mas satelites de la Corea del Juche!
					
					!Manifiesten plenamente el impetu revolucionario de la clase obrera coreana en la marcha general de hoy!
					
					!Terminen sin falta en la hora fijada por el Partido la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan no.3 y la Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Wonsan!
					
					!Aviven el fervor de auge productivo en el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek, el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae, la Aceria de Songjin y el Complejo de Acero Chollima!
					
					!Fabriquen mucho mas locomotoras electricas y vagones de pasajeros de nueva generacion!
					
					!Produzcan en cadena en el nivel mundial los trenes electricos subterraneos a nuestro estilo!
					
					!Aceleren la modernizacion de la industria de extraccion y normalicen la produccion de metales no ferrosos y minerales no metalicos!
					
					!Concentren las fuerzas en la exploracion de recursos naturales para preparar mucho mas fertilizantes iniciales de la construccion de la potencia economica!
					
					!Diversifiquen el comercio exterior!
					
					!Acojamos el VII Congreso del PTC con orgullosos exitos en el mejoramiento de vida del pueblo!
					
					!Continuemos generacion tras generacion la nueva historia de llanura de oro preparada por el gran General!
					
					!Llamen el jaque mate en el dominio agricola de este ano!
					
					!Registren en todo el pais el fervor de produccion de verduras invernaculos!
					
					!Levanten por doquier del pais las modernas bases de produccion de setas como la Fabrica de Setas de la ciudad de Pyongyang!
					
					!Aceleremos la construccion de la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho y creemos nuevo cambio en el desarrollo de la ganaderia!
					
					!Hagan surtir efecto las modernas bases ganaderas construidas por el beneficio del Partido!
					
					!Plantemos en gran escala la hierba "Aeguk"!
					
					!Registremos la revolucion en la pesca para desarrollar decisivamente la industria pesquera del pais!
					
					!Sean propulsor y red de pesca para mantener el paisaje espectacular de abundante pesca!
					
					!Salgamos al mar para incorporar nuestro pais a la lista de paises avanzados en la piscicultura maritima!
					
					!Convirtamos nuestra patria en el pais de fruticultura!
					
					!Resuelvan decisivamente los problemas de articulos de consumo popular!
					
					!Produzcamos mucho mas articulos y mercancias de competitividad mundial!
					
					!Levanten mucho mas edificios arquitectonicos monumentales que representen la epoca del Partido del Trabajo y muestren el impetu de la nacion coreana!
					
					!Construyan la zona de Wonsan como modelo de la formacion urbana y ciudad turistica mundial!
					
					!Apliquemos globalmente los metodos de administracion economica a nuestro estilo basados en la idea Juche!
					
					!Todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo se levanten en la campana de reforestacion!
					
					!Abramos nueva historia de montanas de oro guardando en lo profundo del corazon el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il!
					
					!Glorifiquemos nuestro pais como paraiso de la era del Partido del Trabajo libre de contaminacion ambiental!
					
					!Sostengamos en alto la consigna de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista!
					
					!Pongan el punto final a la enfermedad de importacion!
					
					Las consignas destacan que el levantar cuanto antes el pais civilizado socialista es la ferrea voluntad de nuestro partido y continuan:
					
					!Logremos que el pueblo disfrute de la mayor civilizacion en el maximo nivel!
					
					!Aviven mas las llamas de la revolucion educativa del nuevo siglo!
					
					!Realicemos lo mas pronto posible la formacion a todos los ciudadanos como excelentes cientificos y tecnicos y la transformacion del pais como potencia cientifico-tecnica!
					
					!Manifiesten sin reservas la superioridad del regimen sanitario socialista!
					
					!Abramos nueva era dorada en la construccion de la potencia deportiva con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu!
					
					!Levantemos con mas vigor el fervor deportivo en todo el pais!
					
					!Creen nuevos mitos deportivos de la Corea heroica en las competencias internacionales!
					
					!Registren las revoluciones en la informacion y prensa y en la literatura y arte en el nuevo siglo!
					
					!Creen mucho mas obras maestras de la epoca para infundir el fervor revolucionario y el de lucha a todos los militares y civiles!
					
					!Aprendan el temperamento de creacion de caracter revolucionario y combativo de la Banda Moranbong!
					
					!Dinamicemos las actividades masivas culturales y artisticas para que resuenen mas altamente las canciones de revolucion y lucha en todos los puestos de trabajo!
					
					!Hagamos que reinen en toda la sociedad el sentimiento nacional y el temperamento de vida modesta y hermosa!
					
					!Aceleren con las ciencias y tecnicas la construccion de la potencia economica basada en intelectualidad y del pais civilizado!
					
					!Promuevan con dinamismo la adherencia y la unificacion de las ciencias y tecnicas con la produccion!
					
					!Conviertan en las nuestras las ciencias y tecnicas mundiales con la conviccion del Juche y la dignidad nacional!
					
					Las consignas senalan que las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias garantizan la gran victoria de la ofensiva general de hoy hacia el VII Congreso del PTC, y prosiguen:
					
					!Transformemos todo el ejercito segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo!
					
					!Luchemos a riesgo de la vida por el querido Comandante Supremo, camarada Kim Jong Un! 
					
					!Defendamos el Septimo Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea al intensificar por todos los medios el poderio politico-militar del Ejercito Popular!
					
					!Que se preparen como expertos en la guerra moderna y verdaderos guerreros versados en la estrategia y las tacticas militares de Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il, el heroico espiritu y plena capacidad de combate!
					
					!Escriban la ultima pagina de la destruccion final con los fusiles del monte Paektu si los agresores se atreven a atacar!
					
					!Encarguemonos tanto de la defensa de la patria como de la construccion del socialismo!
					
					!Que pongan de pleno manifiesto el impetu heroico del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu en la lucha para la creacion de la velocidad de Corea!
					
					!Que el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea afile finamente la espada de seguridad al lider, al regimen y al pueblo!
					
					!Seamos escudo de acero y la fiera roja en defender a ultranza al partido, al regimen y al pueblo!
					
					!Construyan mucho mas, mas rapido y mas excelentemente las creaciones monumentales de la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un mediante la operacion conjunta entre el ejercito y el pueblo!
					
					!Materialicemos cabalmente la orientacion de nuestro partido por el armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais!
					
					!Intensifiquen por todos los medios la combatividad del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino al levantar furiosamente el fervor de entrenamiento del monte Paektu!
					
					!Desarrollen y produzcan mucho mas los autoctonos medios militares de golpe capaces de controlar plenamente a los enemigos!
					
					!Que el sector de industria de defensa nacional se contribuya a la construccion de potencia economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo!
					
					Las consignas aseveran que si los jovenes se animan, lo imitara todo el pais y cuanto mas sea rapido su avance tanto mas se adelantara el futuro de la patria poderosa y prospera y prosiguen:
					
					!Que los jovenes sean vanguardias fieles sin limite al querido, camarada Kim Jong Un!
					
					!Adelante siempre recto siguiendo al Partido!
					
					!A toda vela en direccion a la que sopla el viento cortante del Paektu siguiendo la ruta indicada por la revolucion coreana!
					
					!Glorifiquen mas brillantemente cada momento de la juventud con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu!
					
					!Preparen con la creacion de nuevo mito de la juventud heroe el regalo de fidelidad al Septimo Congreso del Partido de Corea!
					
					Las consignas exhortan a promover con dinamismo el gran avance de hoy al elevar mas notablemente la funcion y el papel del poder popular.
					
					Llaman a los funcionarios a ser funcionarios verdaderos que materialicen hasta el final la politica del partido aunque sus cuerpos se despedacen.
					
					La reunificacion de la patria es el deseo de toda la vida de los grandes camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y el maximo anhelo de la nacion coreana, puntualizan y destacan la necesidad de defender, mantener firmemente y glorificar para siembre las imperecederas hazanas de los grandes lideres realizadas para la reunificacion de la patria y lograr de manera independiente la reintegracion territorial segun el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Ademas llaman a conducir la realizacion de la causa de verificacion de la independencia mundial al materializar con estricto la independiente politica exterior del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					!Ampliemos y desarrollemos mas las relaciones exteriores bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad!
					
					!Intensifiquemos la solidaridad con los partidos politicos y pueblos progresistas del mundo!
					
					!Frustren tajantemente las tentativas de agresion e intervencion de los imperialistas y dominacionistas!
					
					!Erradiquemos la politica hostil anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos, causa raigal de la confrontacion y la exacerbacion de tension!
					
					!Luchemos activamente para la realizacion de la paz, la seguridad y la independencia del mundo!
					
					Las consignas finalizan que todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo deben dinamizar la lucha por construir un Estado prospero con el impetu de haber ostentado la dignidad y el prestigio de Corea del Juche para demostrar claramente a todo el mundo como Corea del Songun crea milagros y lanza las salvas de victoria hacia el cielo de mayo.

articles.title: Encuentro para felicitar cumpleanos de contribuyentes a lanzamiento de satelite
articles.content:
Encuentro para felicitar cumpleanos de contribuyentes a lanzamiento de satelite
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Hotel 25 de Abril un encuentro para felicitar cumpleanos de los contribuyentes al exitoso lanzamiento del satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4.
					En la ocasion hizo uso de la palabra.
					
					Antes de felicitar a los huespedes, el orador se refirio a que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un invito a Pyongyang a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios que aportaron al exitoso lanzamiento del satelite para que ellos puedan gozar del maximo favor especial e hizo preparar el encuentro para felicitar a los conquistadores del cosmos quienes acogen cumpleanos en el periodo de preparacion del lanzamiento del satelite y la permanencia en esta capital.
					
					En el cordial amor reiterado del Mariscal esta impregnada  gran confianza de que ellos cumplan siempre el papel de vanguardia en lograr la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero, subrayo.
					
					Y exhorto a realizar exitosamente el gran proyecto de nuestro Partido en materia de la construccion de la potencia del cosmos, al crear grandiosos saltos e innovaciones en el empeno para mayor victoria de la exploracion del cosmos, con el mismo espiritu y temple con que lanzamos perfectamente el  satelite en acato al noble espiritu del Mariscal.
